Articles.Content:
I was doing pad abort tests earlier and I noticed that the stock LAS is pretty... wimpy. This is where my request comes in. Would someone be willing to make a...

1.25m LAS

-Orion-like

-powerful, large

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AqeJzItldSQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

.625m LAS

[-Red, mercury like](http://www.nasa.gov/centers/johnson/about/history/jsc40/jsc_gallery_people_image4.html)

-enough to get the job done

All help is appreciated. If no one wants to do it, I can do it myself. I'm just a bit of a novice with blender and photoshop and such.

Thank you! 

SmallFatFetus
